MAN.TITLE: rgb2gray
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Convert RGB images to gray images

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: A RGB image (hypermat), the dimension of RGB should be M x N x 3.
Output image, a gray image which dimension is M x N and has the same data type as RGB.

DESCRIPTION.P: rgb2gry convert RGB images to gray scale images using G = 0.299*R + 0.587*G + 0.114*B.

SECTION.label: Bugs and Shortcomings
SECTION.P: The algorithm should be optimized to improve performance.
